text: Babin is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Bełżyce, within Lublin County, Lublin Voivodeship, in eastern Poland. It lies approximately east of Bełżyce and west of the regional capital Lublin. The village has a population of 830. A large skirmish took place near the village during the November Uprising (17 April 1831). ==References== Category:Villages in Lublin County
title: Babin, Lublin Voivodeship
